articles.author: Ioanna Lykiardopoulou
articles.title: Rapid delivery giant Getir quits France, citing regulation hurdles
articles.description:
Quick commerce platform Getir is bidding adieu to the French market — less than two years since starting its operations in the country.

In a press release sent to AFP, the company ...

articles.author: Siôn Geschwindt
articles.title: Mobility giant Bolt adopts self-driving Starship robots for food delivery
articles.description: Bolt plans to roll out thousands of the robots across multiple countries, starting in its home city of Tallinn later this year.
